single_crochet x 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 4 8 © caryn shepler a k a beadedgeek 2025 9 thou dost jest joining *modify placement as desired use sewing head pins to hold the joining piece in place right leg until satisfied with placement attach using using the same method of joining as the left stitch specified for the piece leg start on the left side of the right leg work clockwise and start in row 5 1 stitch *when adjusting piece placement and using right of center on the body whip stitch ensure that each stitch on the piece is attached to a corresponding stitch fasten_off bury ends on the main piece body hood etc side facing arm to body sits at the front of the jester 8 or more stitches apart using arm color back stitch through row 9 stitch 1 of arm and row 16 of body at using the same joining method as for front standard arm placement continue for a facing legs changing your starting point for total of 4 stitches standard arm placement each leg sample starts at 4 stitches off is 7 stitches left and right of center for 4 center both right and left stitches this places the arms down at the side fasten_off bury ends points to hood if you are using long points identify the repeat for the second arm natural bend and place the bend
